lead_paragraph: The United States rugby team was routed by Canada, 56-7, yesterday in St. John’s, Newfoundland, giving the Canadians a spot in next year’s World Cup and sending the Americans to a regional playoff against Uruguay.
snippet: The United States rugby team was routed by Canada, 56-7, yesterday in St. John’s, Newfoundland, giving the Canadians a spot in next year’s World Cup and sending the Americans to a regional playoff against Uruguay.
